original_text: Then Herod and his soldiers ridiculed and mocked him. Dressing him in an elegant robe, they sent him back to Pilate.
korean_text: 헤롯이 그 군인들과 함께 예수를 업신여기며 희롱하고 빛난 옷을 입혀 빌라도에게 도로 보내니

sentences.original_text: Then Herod and his soldiers ridiculed and mocked him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 헤롯과 그의 병사들이 그를 조롱하고 비웃었습니다

sentences.original_text: Dressing him in an elegant robe
they sent him back to Pilate
